alert.note: Alert for Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Blackfoot Mountains; Eastern Magic Valley; Lower Snake River Plain; Marsh and Arbon Highlands; Shoshone, Lava Beds; Upper Snake River Plain; Wood River Foothills (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 5:31PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...STRONG OUTFLOW WINDS FROM COLLAPSING THUNDERSTORMS SPREADING OUT ACROSS INL AND THE SHOSHONE LAVA BEDS THROUGH 630 PM MDT... At 527 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking multiple outflow boundaries extending from 6 miles northwest of Roberts to 10 miles southeast of Southeast Inl to 15 miles southwest of Southwest Inl to 7 miles north of Richfield, spreading southeast into the Snake River Plain and Shoshone Lave Beds at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 45 mph and blowing dust are possible along these outflow boundaries as they spread southeast toward the Interstate 15 and 84 corridors. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds and blowing dust could create difficult driving conditions. Locations impacted include... Idaho Falls, Blackfoot, Rigby, Carey, Lorenzo, Goshen, Ririe Reservoir, American Falls Reservoir, Ammon, Shelley, Iona, Ucon, Menan, Ririe, Roberts, Richfield, Firth, Lewisville, Atomic City and Archer. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
